channel.title: Network on purpleidea.com
channel.description: Recent content in Network on purpleidea.com

item.title: Automatic edges in mgmt
item.description: It’s been two months since I announced mgmt, and now it’s time to continue the story by telling you more about the design of what’s now in git master. Before I get into those details, let me quickly recap what’s happened since then. Mgmt community recap: I gave the first public presentation about mgmt at CfgMgmtCamp. I repeated the talk at DevConf.cz. The video recording is available. Felix wrote about his work cross compiling puppet code to mgmt.
